original_text: You must respect people like them. Do what they say. And also respect everyone who works hard to serve God together with them.
korean_text: 이같은 사람들과 또 함께 일하며 수고하는 모든 사람에게 순종하라

sentences.original_text: You must respect people like them.
who works hard to serve God together with them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들과 함께 하나님을 섬기기 위해 열심히 일하는.
